SEARCH
Package de.chojo.jdautil.parsing

Class DiscordResolver

java.lang.Object
de.chojo.jdautil.parsing.DiscordResolver
public class DiscordResolver extends Object
Class which can be used to resolve different discord entities from strings.

      Get user objects which are valid on the guild by a list of ids, tags, or name.
      Parameters:
      guild - guild for lookup
      userStrings - list of user ids, names and/or tags
      Returns:
      list of users without null

    • fuzzyGuildUserSearch

      public static List<WeightedEntry<Member>> fuzzyGuildUserSearch(Guild guild, String userString)
      Search a user by fuzzy search on a guild.
      Parameters:
      guild - guild to search
      userString - user string to search
      Returns:
      a list of users. if a direct match was found only 1 user. if guild id is invalid a empty list is returned.

    • fuzzyGuildTargetSearch

      public static List<WeightedEntry<Member>> fuzzyGuildTargetSearch(String userString, Collection<Member> targets)
      Search a user by fuzzy search on a guild.
      Parameters:
      userString - user string to search
      targets - possible targets
      Returns:
      a list of users. if a direct match was found only 1 user. if guild id is invalid a empty list is returned.

    • getUserDeepSearch

      public static Optional<User> getUserDeepSearch(ShardManager shardManager, String userString, Guild guild)
      Searches for a user. First on a guild and after this on all users the bot currently know. Equal to calling getGuildUser(Guild, String) and getUser(ShardManager, String).
      Parameters:
      userString - string for lookup
      guild - guild for lookup
      Returns:
      user object or null if no user is found

      Parameters:
      userString - string for lookup
      Returns:
      user object or null if no user is found

      Returns:
      a list of user objects. without null

      Search a user by fuzzy search.
      Parameters:

      Returns:
      a list of users. if a direct match was found only
